about_the_game:
In

In a fantastic world called Secret Forest, the land is divided into two parts: Light and Darkness. In the Light, a fair and benevolent king rules alongside nobles and knights who protect the citizens and maintain peace in the kingdom. Meanwhile, in the Darkness, the most terrible and evil forces led by a dark lord seek to conquer the Light and plunge the whole world into eternal darkness.

Players assume the role of a young warrior who must choose between joining the forces of Light or Darkness. If they choose the side of Light, they must fight against the most sinister creatures found in the Darkness, from demons to undead. If they choose the side of Darkness, they will have to confront the forces of Light, including nobles and knights who defend the kingdom.

The player's objective is to defeat the leader of the opposing faction. If the player chooses the side of Light, the goal is to defeat the dark lord and put an end to his tyranny. If the player chooses the side of Darkness, the goal is to defeat the king and establish the dominion of Darkness over the entire world.

Throughout the game, the player will encounter all kinds of magical creatures and face exciting challenges, from solving puzzles to fighting final bosses. The choice of side will affect how the characters interact with the world and with other characters in the game. Ultimately, the choice of side will determine the outcome of the game and the fate of the Secret Forest world.
